TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
A34, B43, take the third left just after the greengrocers, past the bridge then take the path on your right just after the post box and keep walking until you reach the black gate.

Where the bloody hell have all my socks gone?

They've gone in t' yer tea, lad.

What wi' all t' Yorkshire?

Th' Yorkshire 's gone t' f'lln' the ol' tras'cans n' the back-neck o' th' woods.

Mirror, mirror on the wall, who is the prettiest of them all?

Mirror: Me. because everybody looks at me to find the answer.

Whos the second prettiest of them all?

The stonefish.

How does one obtain an antidote for the stonefish's horrific sting?

By not stepping on a stonefish.

How do you press the big red button?

By pressing it.

How are you today?

Approximately human.

What are you today?

Approximately human.

Why do today what you could put off 'till tomorrow?

Because you should live like there is no tomorrow!

Is it just me, or do I have no life?

You have dead life, that's for sure.

I can't breathe.

Apparently you can't see the difference between a question and a statement, either.

How does one acquire a choir?

With a singin' group saying shoop-de-woop! (I can't rhyme )

WHHHHHHHY?!

Science isn't about why, it's about why not!

X-files = Good?

The truth isn't out there.

How do you spell muffin?

with a silent Q, followed by an inverted comma and a hieroglyph (varies depending on the flavour and size).

Can you hear the bubbles melt?

Yes, but only if you take out your headphones.

Can a match box? If you understand this I immediately like you.

No, but tin can.

Why do our feet smell and our noses run?

Please, they're having an identity crisis and they really don't want to talk about it right now.

How is it possible that the above post was FishInferno's 0th post? (I am serious, that's what it says)

because posts here don't count as posts...er...i mean because the kraken ate that particular post for breakfast today.

What is the krakens favorite food?

Innocent KSP player's ships, pizza, and tacos......and posts

Who controls The KrakenÃ¢â€žÂ¢?

Trick question. Only the Kraken can control the Kraken.

What can go up the chimney down, but can't go down the chimney up?

Trick question, only the Kraken can do that.

What's in a name?

Letters.

Why do we drive in a parkway and park in a driveway?

Because of the amazing befuddling power of alcoholic beverages.

Why does the person above me appear to have no posts yet? (I know that this has been asked but seriously!)
